amendment.description: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 24, as amendment No. 41, to earmark $600 million of the funds for local law enforcement block grants for rural areas with population of 50,000 or less.

action.text: Mr. Rogers raised a point of order against the Stupak amendment (A007). Mr. Rogers stated that the amendment adds legislative language on an appropriations bill and is therefore not in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
